nodes.text: Roz was a male Human pilot who worked with Kova, Facee and Hatto West. During the Imperial Era, the quartet robbed Baron Serk with the help of the Toydarian merchant Nel Henol.
Roz was first mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
